name: Sobway Sorfer
description:
Have you ever been playing Subway surfer and thought to yourself: This game would be better if it was 10x uglier and made entirely from stock images?

Introducing: Sobway Sorfers

featuring:

  • bad graphics
  • bad game play
  • bad optimization
  • and everything else you didn't ask for

So to all the  people braindead enough to want to play my game: download the deffinitly-not-a-virus apk (its not really a virus, i have nowhere near enough intelligence to create a virus) and marvel at how incredibly poorly this game is made
